name: 3D Organon Anatomy | Enterprise Edition
detailed_description:
*****PLEASE NOTICE, THIS IS THE ENTERPRISE EDITION OF 3D ORGANON ANATOMY*****

CONTACT YOUR INSTITUTION OR OUR SUPPORT TEAM FOR LOGIN INSTRUCTIONS.

FOR ACCESS TO THE PERSONAL EDITION search ‘3D Organon Anatomy’ (for desktop version) and ‘3D Organon VR Anatomy’ (for VR version).

3D Organon is a multi-award winning self-discovery experience into the human body. You can now visualize the skeletal system, muscles, vessels, nerves, and other organs in 3D. Delve into the human model and see what you are made of. The app features an extensive knowledge-base of anatomical definitions with terminology based on the official Terminologia Anatomica.

The Guest mode of 3D Organon in this version is free and includes all 3D models of the skeletal system and connective tissues, and the human ‘Actions‘ module which contains extensive animations of joints and bones. Full access to the Enterprise edition for institutions and professionals will unlock all human body systems and an additional 500 detailed animations of muscle actions and organ physiology.

Game changer multi-user anatomy trainer
The new ‘Network’ module allows participants to join multi-user online virtual training sessions hosted by subscribed educators and institutions without any charges. The awesome anatomy trainer enables you to attend online anatomy lessons and communicate with your teacher and peers in real-time through voice and chat messages. The new module is cross platform, setting no barriers to users joining a session via any supported device. All major virtual reality and non-virtual reality devices are supported. The upgrade to an Enterprise license grants access to advanced teaching tools that could complement any anatomy curriculum. Educators and healthcare professionals can now visualize and explore anatomy as never before.

The virtual reality version of 3D Organon has been featured in the keynote speech of Mark Zuckerberg, co-founder and CEO of Facebook, in the OC3 conference, and by Cher Wang, the chairwoman of HTC, in MWC 2019. It has been recommended by leading publications reporting on the future of science, education, and medicine, such as Huffington Post, Scimex, SBS, Futurism, and many others.

Educational advantages include gamification of learning owing to the fact that students find the experience stimulating, engaging, and entertaining.

The 3D models in 3D Organon can add important cognitive input which enhances the in-depth understanding of key anatomical concepts and retention of knowledge.

Who is 3D Organon Anatomy for?
The app is designed to suit a wide range of individuals from medical and allied-health students to patients, artists, and curious minds. It helps students grasp the challenging subject of anatomy, but it is also easily understood by laypeople without a medical background.

The application delivers accurate visual and textual information, immediate response time and intuitive navigation. It satisfies the highest standards of medical and scientific accuracy. The anatomical definitions and clinical correlations are authored by professors of anatomy and medical professionals.

Awesome features
*****Examine thousands of high detail 3D anatomy models
*****Easily understand spatial relationships between anatomical structures
*****Learn and teach anatomy with the latest technology advancements
*****Zoom up and examine 3D models with astonishing detail
*****Join multi-user virtual anatomy rooms and communicate with your tutor and peers like never before
*****Accurate anatomical terminology and definitions
*****Unique stereoscopic presentation of anatomy in a 3D environment
*****System-based anatomy module
*****Topographic anatomy module
*****Regional anatomy module
*****Anatomy models designed by medical professionals with precision and aesthetics
*****Save your models in Favorites for later reference
*****X-ray mode feature (‘Fade’ function)
*****Live search tool
*****Addition/subtraction buttons for displaying muscles into layers, from deep to superficial
*****Discover Lock mode — a powerful tool enabling you to operate on user-defined structures and body systems
*****Quick switch between multiple work scenes
*****Single- and Multi-select modes
*****Fast switch between male and female anatomy models
*****Skeletal system and joint animations for free!

Human body systems available in the Guest mode access (2 systems)
*Skeletal
*Connective

Enterprise licensing will grant access to all human body systems (15 systems)
*Skeletal
*Connective
*Muscular
*Arterial
*Venous
*Nervous
*Lymphatic
*Heart
*Respiratory
*Digestive
*Endocrine (male/female)
*Urinary (male/female)
*Reproductive (male/female)
*Sensory organs
*Integumentary/skin (male/female)

short_description: 3D Organon Anatomy | Enterprise Edition is a is an interactive human anatomy application featuring all 15 body systems. Learn human anatomy with over 4,000 realistic anatomical models/structures sided with quality text descriptions per body structure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 | AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible card with a least 1.5GB video ram, Screen resolution 1280x768
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 2-button optical scroll mouse required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, Intel Core i7 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible card with a least 2GB video ram, Screen resolution 1280x900
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 2-button optical scroll mouse required

ext_user_account_notice: Free ‘Guest’ mode for multiuser clients. For Enterprise licensing options check https://shop.medis-media.com/.

content_descriptors.notes:
3D Organon Anatomy is a medical anatomy software which contains detailed 3D anatomy models of the male and female human body including the Reproductive and Integumentary (skin) systems.
All 3D models in the software are designed under the supervision of anatomy professors and medical professionals.
